pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pycorsikaio [![CI](https://github.com/cta-observatory/pycorsikaio/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/cta-observatory/pycorsikaio/actions/workflows/ci.yml) [![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/corsikaio.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/corsikaio)Python module to read the CORSIKA binary output files.## InstallRun```pip install corsikaio```## FeaturesLoad CORSIKA binary particle or cherenkov data files using python and numpy.Also supports MMCS 6.5```pythonfrom corsikaio import CorsikaCherenkovFileimport matplotlib.pyplot as pltwith CorsikaCherenkovFile('cer000001') as f: print(f.run_header['run_number']) print(f.version) for e in f: print(e.header['total_energy']) plt.scatter(e.photons['x'], e.photons['y']) plt.show()```
